attributes.action: NOT GIVE IN TO PRESSURE FROM THE MEDIA - STAY AND FIGHT THE NEXT ELECTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For the Prime Minister to NOT give in to pressure from either the media or members in the Labour Party who would seem determined to undermine him. They are many living away from the Conservative biased South
who think Gordon is the best man to stay at the top. Forget about posturing politicians who have no alternative policies to offer but are concerned only in trying to discredit the PM . Keep up the fight Prime Minister!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
